Great game to hang out with friends

Matchmaking will drive you insane. Cheaters, smurfs, throwers, griefers, and afk players every game. Ranking system sucks. You will work hard to get a rank, then take a break from a month and you're back to where you started. Not to mention it takes 10 consecutive wins for a rank up but only 3 losses for a derank.

Don't waste your time and your sanity. Go play another game, or do something better with your free time. You will regret it if you don't.
